post_content:
Down to just six cards remaining for 520.  Mostly a binder set of quality raw cards mixed with Graded 1s - 4s 

On the advice of Cory Robinson (one of the greatest dudes in this space BTW) I started with some of the more difficult cards to find and now have just a few HOFers left, which are always available somewhere, just a matter of cost.


Cobb, Ty (Portrait - Green)
Cobb, Ty (Bat On Shoulder)
Johnson, Walter (Portrait)
Tinker, Joe (Bat Off Shoulder)

Demmitt, Ray (St. Louis Amer.)
O'Hara, Bill (St. Louis)


Five of these six will require me to save and reload between purchases, but right now that Tinker is just low hanging fruit. 

If anyone has a decent Tinker , Bat Off , hit me up. 

Thanks in advance


PS - always buying Tom Downey batting and Fielding
Cory is indeed an excellent guy. Good luck on the remaining. A wonderful achievement.
I would third that on Cory.  Great guy.
Thanks Guys!  Feeling is mutual - you've all been great to deal with.
